title.landing-ping-pong-1-1: A technological solution that facilitates the sharing of underused food equipment, for the benefit of all
title.landing-ping-pong-1-2: A digital platform that makes it possible to link the needs of organizations with the resources available in a territory

title.landing-page-list-item3: I use the site's messaging system to make an agreement
text.landing-ping-pong-item1: MutuAli enables organizations to increase their production and distribution capacity without having to make expensive investments. The ultimate goal is to provide more meals to vulnerable populations, by pooling resources and increasing collaboration.
text.landing-ping-pong-item2: This La Cantine pour tous project is part of the Montr√©al en commun innovation community.

text.ad-disclaimers:
La Cantine pour tous (MutuAli) cannot and does not guarantee the correctness, accuracy or completeness of the information provided by users of the site, and it makes no guarantees and provides no conditions to this regard. In addition, La Cantine pour tous (MutuAli) cannot be held responsible for any inaccuracies or omissions in the information displayed on the advertisements on this Website.

title.landing-page: The digital platform that facilitates the sharing of food equipment
text.about-us.mutuali:
La plateforme MutuAli

MutuAli a √©t√© d√©velopp√©e dans le but d‚Äôoffrir aux organisations un outil qui permet de faire l‚Äôarrimage entre les besoins et les ressources disponibles sur le territoire, et de faciliter le processus de partage d‚Äô√©quipements.

La r√©alisation de la plateforme num√©rique MutuAli est soutenue par la Ville de Montr√©al, dans le cadre de Montr√©al en commun, une communaut√© de projets d‚Äôinnovation d√©ploy√©e depuis 2019.

En savoir plus sur la plateforme
text.about-us.title: About MutuAli
text.about-us.description: The MutuAli digital platform is part of the equipment pooling project of La Cantine pour tous, a food security charity.
text.sharing-equipment.collective-effort: By sharing your equipment you can not only benefit from additional income, but you also contribute to the collective effort to implement sustainable solutions in the bio-food sector, by optimizing the existing equipment and infrastructure.
text.sharing-equipment.where-to-start:
I'm interested, where do I start?

You have questions about equipment sharing? Are you wondering how to proceed? Contact us for personalized support.

notification.contact-form-error: An error occured when trying to send your request.
text.looking-for-equipment.check-ads:
Access the ads list

Want to see what equipment is available near you? No need to create an account, you can view the map. You will then need to create an account to contact the owners.
text.sharing-equipment.why-using-mutuali:
Why use MutuAli?

Using the MutuAli platform allows you to quickly display your equipment in the common inventory, and easily reach and communicate with potential tenants.

With MutuAli, you determine the terms of the agreement to be concluded: availability, terms of sharing (rental, exchange of services, etc.), prices, etc. If you need help, we're here for you.

By joining the platform, you contribute to:

  • develop a support network based on trust;
  • implement affordable and sustainable solutions for food security organizations;
  • sustain the social mission and community activities of these organizations.
How it works?
text.sharing-equipment.description: What if the professional equipment you own could be used by others when you are not using it?
text.landing-page-privacy-policy: Open pdf file Privacy policy
text.looking-for-equipment.why-using-mut:
Why use MutuAli?

Using the MutuAli platform allows you to quickly consult the equipment available around you, using the map.

Because each project is unique, do not hesitate to contact the owners to discuss your needs. Instant messaging allows you to reach them easily.

By joining the platform, you contribute to:

  • develop a support network based on trust;
  • implement affordable and sustainable solutions for food security organizations;
  • sustain the social mission and community activities of these organizations.
How it works?
text.landing-page-terms-of-use: Open pdf file Terms of use
text.looking-for-equipment.description: Do you need a kitchen, a truck, storage space or more? Whether for a one-time request or a recurring need, your search can start here.
text.landingpage.heading.text: Kitchens, trucks, storage spaces and more: MutuAli allows the alignment between the needs of organizations and the resources available in Quebec.
text.landingpage.got-equipement-to-share: Do you have equipment that is available at certain times? Share it with other organizations and receive additional income at the same time.
text.landingpage.cta.title: Let's talk together!
text.about-us.pooling:
Le projet de mutualisation des √©quipements

Depuis sa cr√©ation, La Cantine pour tous a d√©j√† mis√© plusieurs fois sur les avantages de la mutualisation pour soutenir ses membres dans le d√©veloppement de leurs activit√©s: mutualisation de savoir-faire en construisant un r√©seau d‚Äôentraide, mutualisation d‚Äôoutils de production, et m√™me la cr√©ation et mutualisation d‚Äôune plateforme transactionnelle qui permets aux membres participants de b√©n√©ficier d‚Äôune plateforme de commande de repas en ligne.

Avec ce projet et avec la plateforme MutuAli, La Cantine pour tous souhaite outiller ses membres et l‚Äôensemble des organismes pour:

  • partager des infrastructures et √©quipements alimentaires - et ainsi permettre d‚Äôoptimiser l‚Äôusage des ressources des uns, tout en offrant des solutions abordables aux autres;
  • valoriser les √©quipements sous-utilis√©s sur le territoire, contribue √† r√©duire l‚Äôachat et la construction d‚Äôinfrastructures suppl√©mentaires et s‚Äôinscrire dans une volont√© de mettre en place une √©conomie plus environnementale et responsable;
  • mettre en relation les organisations et entreprises bioalimentaires, contribuer √† b√¢tir un milieu solidaire et favoriser les opportunit√©s de collaboration au b√©n√©fice des organismes en s√©curit√© alimentaire.
text.about-us.cantine:
La Cantine pour tous

La Cantine pour tous est un organisme de bienfaisance regroupant des organismes communautaires et des entreprises d'√©conomie sociale qui offrent des services alimentaires dans leur milieu, dans plusieurs r√©gions du Qu√©bec.

La mission commune qui anime ses membres est de favoriser la s√©curit√© alimentaire de tous les citoyens en facilitant une offre de repas sains et abordables, en particulier pour les enfants et les a√Æn√©s.

En savoir plus sur la Cantine
